item.title: aws tips and tricks
item.description: aws clone The easier way is through the web management console:go to the instanceselect the instance and click on instance actioncreate imageOnce you have an image you can launch another cloned instance, data and all. :)

item.title: All about amazon aws s3
item.description: https://github.com/aws/aws-cli https://github.com/s3tools/s3cmd https://serverfault.com/questions/84815/how-can-i-get-the-size-of-an-amazon-s3-bucket apt install aws-cli aws –configure #enter access key, secret key and region list files/folder di bucket s3 (ls s3) aws s3 ls s3://namabuckets3nya disk usage s3 (du -sh s3) s3cmd du s3://namabuckets3nya aws s3 rsync https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/reference/s3/sync.html
